subject: Career
title: The Art of the Warm Introduction
description: A quick, practical guide to The Art of the Warm Introduction.

hook.text: A mutual friend says: 'You two should meet.' That warm intro is 10x more powerful than a cold email.

buildup.text: Warm introductions carry borrowed trust. The connector's reputation is on the line.

discovery.text: The double opt-in intro is the gold standard: ask both parties before connecting them.

twist.text: Requesting intros without context puts your connector in an awkward position. Give them the 'why.'

climax.text: Make it easy: 'Could you intro me to Sara? I want to ask about her team's approach to X.'

punchline.text: Cold opens doors. Warm introductions open them wider.

quiz.question: What is the double opt-in introduction?
options: Asking both parties before connecting them
